participant_1.background:
I sometimes forget to water my plants, but I'm trying to be better about it.
I remember spending hours in my room reading books while my dad worked.
I'm not worried about the weather because I have to be ready for any condition when I fly.
My car is a convertible, so I can enjoy the sun and the wind in my hair while listening to my favorite music.
I'm afraid of not being able to make my juicing bar a success.

participant_2.background:
I've learned to live without my dad.
i m a vegetarian but i eat fish , especially sushi.
i was accepted to participate.
I have been reminiscing about my childhood while watching my kids play in the creek.
I am not comfortable sharing my weight.

content.text: What do you do for a living?
That sounds like a fun job! Do you get to travel a lot?
I do! I love it! I've been to a lot of cool places.
I love to travel too! I've been to a few countries, but I want to see more.
I've been to Canada, Mexico, and the Caribbean. I want to go to Europe and Asia someday.
Europe is amazing! I've been to France, Italy, and Spain. They're all so beautiful.
I've heard great things about those places! I'd love to go to Italy and see the Colosseum.
The Colosseum is amazing! You should definitely go.
I will! I'm going to start planning my trip soon.
Good luck! I'm sure you'll have a great time.
Thanks! I'm looking forward to it.
